message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $18,000. I believe it holds significant value and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could meet you halfway at $14,000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,500. Can you consider that?
